import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { Card, Button, Form, Col, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; import { CartContext } from "../context/CartContext"; import "./ProductCard.css"; const ProductCard = ({ product }) => { const cartContext = useContext(CartContext); const productQuantity = cartContext.getProductQuantity(product.id); console.log(cartContext.items); return ( {product.text}
  • {product.description}
 Price: Â£{product.price.toFixed(2)} {productQuantity > 0 ? ( <>
In Cart: {productQuantity}
) : ( <>
)} ); }; export default ProductCard;
